meanings.definition: A map made by combining aerial photographs and topographical data.
meanings.sent1: I used photomaps to find my way around the city.
meanings.sent2: The photomaps showed the different landmarks from above.
meanings.sent3: The photomaps made it look like the city was a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a photomap of memories, each picture leading to a different place.
meanings.sent5: The photomaps were so detailed, it felt like I was flying over the city.

meanings.definition: To create a map using aerial photographs.
meanings.sent1: We decided to photomap the entire area for our project.
meanings.sent2: The team photomaps the terrain before planning the hiking trail.
meanings.sent3: He photomaps like a pro, capturing every detail from above.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to photomap the landscape was like painting a picture from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The way he photomaps the city makes it come alive on paper.
